upgrades.changelog: Modified Smart Bulb Mode so that the output can only be turned off by sending a BasicSet(0x00). Fixed: Solve the problem that the power measured by the light is 5W when the load is not connected (caused by inaccurate power measurement at extremely low power consumption). Feature: Added config button scenes and basic scenes. This version only (Not enough storage space going further).
Fixed - Optimization of Aux mode in neutral setting. Fixed - The inoperative issue after changing parameter 8 from high value to low value.
